Title: Cabin Fever
Writer: Eli Roth, Randy Pearlstein, Eli Roth (story by)
Actors: Rider Strong, Jordan Ladd, James DeBello, Cerina Vincent
Plot: Five college graduates rent a cabin in the woods and begin to fall victim to a horrifying flesh-eating virus, which attracts the unwanted attention of the homicidal locals.
Production: Down Home Entertainment, Deer Path Films, Black Sky Entertainment, Tonic Films LLC
